0.1.name: wordpress/fatpanda-singly
0.1.description:
DISCLAIMER: Fat Panda, LLC is not affiliated with Singly, Inc.

This plugin helps you use AppFabric by Singly to allow your users to log into your WordPress site using their accounts with Facebook, Twitter, Google, and 29 other social-ready services.

Services supported:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Google
  • LinkedIn
  • WordPress.com
  • Github
  • 37signals
  • BodyMedia
  • Dropbox
  • Dwolla
  • Flickr
  • foursquare
  • imgur
  • Instagram
  • Klout
  • Meetup
  • PayPal
  • Picasa
  • Rdio
  • Reddit
  • RunKeeper
  • Shutterfly
  • SoundCloud
  • StockTwits
  • Tout
  • Tumblr
  • Withings
  • Yahoo
  • Yammer
  • YouTube
  • Zeo
